item.description:
Grace would like our help to welcome in the Chinese New Year!!

She is inviting group members to her home for chinese dinner to
celebrate chinese new year.

She insists there is no need to bring anything, she will be preparing the food.

Please respectully RSVP and keep up to date if your plans change as we are limiting the number on this event to fit comfortably in Grace's home.

Directions/Address will be provided individually.

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Grace invites us to welcome in the Chinese New Year
